label: 名田
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Literally, rice fields in local possession. The regular annual tax (nengu) was due from all myōden, whether held by local farmers (hyakushō) or by estate officers ↓(shōkan). Myōden were an area's primary productive base.　[年貢、百姓、荘官]
